title: some issue with the board
body:
https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/464030089622061066/621075995688042496/unknown.png

No matter how much I tick it, it will always at some time like 2 days or 3 appear again and give me the same option not to see this alert again

replies.body: You drew a nice box around the checkbox but scribbled the URL? Why not draw a box over that as well?
You could have something auto-clearing your cookies/cache/whatever it's called. It's the same reason you probably always have to relog into the website every time you use it.
Do you have to re-login when you come back to League Forums? That might be why.
